ScrollView.LinearLayout:
<TextView android:textColor="#000000" android:text="Websites:" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:textSize="24sp" android:background=#FFCA28"/> <TextView android:textColor="#000000" android:text="www.aclu.org/know-your-rights" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:textSize="20sp" android:background=#FFCA28" /> <TextView android:textColor="#000000" android:text="www.nedva.org" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:textSize="20sp" android:background=#FFCA28"/>
<TextView android:textColor="#000000" android:text="www.loveisrespect.org" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:background=#FFCA28" android:textSize="20sp" /> <TextView android:textColor="#000000" android:text="www.safehorizon.org" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:background=#FFCA28" android:textSize="20sp" />
<TextView android:textColor="#000000" android:text="Phone nummbers:" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:textSize="24sp" android:background=#FFCA28"/>
<TextView android:textColor="#000000" android:text="Women’s resource center’s domestic abuse Hotline: 405-705-5540" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:textSize="20sp" android:background=#FFCA28" />
<TextView android:textColor="#000000" android:text="National Dating abuse Helpline: 1-800-331-9474" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:background=#FFCA28" android:textSize="20sp" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/textView3" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="National Domestic Violence Hotline: 1-800-799-7233" android:textColor="#000000" android:background=#FFCA28" android:textSize="20sp" />
